definitions.definition: Not variable ; unalterable ; uniform ; always having the same value .
That cannot undergo inflection , conjugation or declension .
examples: The French adjective marron ‘brown’ is invariable : it does not take the usual s in the plural.
definitions.label_groups: by extension , grammar , of a word, or a grammatical class

main_definition: Not variable ; unalterable ; uniform ; always having the same value .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , grammar , of a word, or a grammatical class ) That cannot undergo inflection , conjugation or declension .
